name: LiturgyoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Start your day by getting a quick briefing on the Liturgical calendar for the day. There are four different feeds to choose from, according to the closest timezone: Pacific, Mountain, Central and Eastern. The data is provided by John R. D'Orazio's Liturgical Calendar API. The Liturgical Data is based on the various editions of the Roman Missal and on the decrees of the Congregation for Divine Worship.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
